Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at top of rim, glazed streaky black below; traces of added red bands; exterior: dot and chequer pattern around rim, reserved below; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the rim pattern, see British Museum 1886,0401.456 and 1551.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1096) (phase 2)
